activities.name: Copy cases and death to SQL
Copy Daily Hospital Admissions Data
activities.description: Copy Daily Hospital Admissions Data to SQL DB

properties.description: Various Data pulled from ECDC website related COVID 19
Trigger to start the copy process as soon as input file is available.

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code as string,
		continent as string,
		population as integer,
		indicator as string,
		daily_count as short,
		date as date,
		rate_14_day as double,
		source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CasesAndDeathSources
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code_2_digit as string,
		country_code_3_digit as string,
		continent as string,
		population as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SelectCountry
CasesAndDeathSources filter(continent == 'Europe' && not(isNull(country_code))) ~> FilterEuroOnly
FilterEuroOnly select(mapColumn(
		country,
		country_code,
		population,
		indicator,
		daily_count,
		source,
		each(match(name=='date'),
			'reported'+'_date' = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOnlyReqFields
SelectOnlyReqFields pivot(groupBy(country,
		country_code,
		population,
		source,
		reported_date,
		country_special = country+', '+country_code),
	pivotBy(indicator, ['confirmed cases', 'deaths']),
	count = sum(daily_count),
	columnNaming: '$V_$N',
	lateral: true) ~> PivotCounts
PivotCounts, SelectCountry lookup(PivotCounts@country == SelectCountry@country,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCountry
LookupCountry select(mapColumn(
		country = PivotCounts@country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		population = PivotCounts@population,
		cases_count = {confirmed cases_count},
		deaths_count,
		reported_date,
		source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectReqFieldsFrmLookup
SelectReqFieldsFrmLookup sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CasesAndDeathsSink

source(output(
		country as string,
		indicator as string,
		date as date,
		year_week as string,
		value as double,
		source as string,
		url as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> HospitalAdmissionSource
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code_2_digit as string,
		country_code_3_digit as string,
		continent as string,
		population as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CountrySource
source(output(
		date_key as string,
		date as date,
		year as string,
		month as short,
		day as short,
		day_name as string,
		day_of_year as short,
		week_of_month as short,
		week_of_year as string,
		month_name as string,
		year_month as integer,
		year_week as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DimDateSource
HospitalAdmissionSource select(mapColumn(
		country,
		indicator,
		value,
		source,
		each(match(name=='date'),
			'reported_'+'date' = $$),
		each(match(name=='year_week'),
			'reported_'+'year_week' = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectReqFields
SelectReqFields, CountrySource lookup(SelectReqFields@country == CountrySource@country,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCountry
LookupCountry select(mapColumn(
		country = SelectReqFields@country,
		indicator,
		reported_date,
		reported_year_week,
		value,
		source,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		population
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectReqFieldFrmLookup
SelectReqFieldFrmLookup split(indicator == 'Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k' || indicator == 'Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k',
	disjoint: false) ~> SplitDailyFromWeekly@(Weekly, Daily)
DimDateSource aggregate(groupBy(ecdc_year_week = year+'-W'+lpad(week_of_year,2,'0')),
	week_start_date = min(date),
		week_end_date = max(date)) ~> AggregateDimDate
SplitDailyFromWeekly@Weekly, AggregateDimDate join(reported_year_week == ecdc_year_week,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinWithDate
JoinWithDate pivot(groupBy(country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		population,
		reported_year_week,
		week_start_date,
		week_end_date,
		source),
	pivotBy(indicator, ['Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k', 'Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k']),
	count = sum(value),
	columnNaming: '$V_$N',
	lateral: true) ~> PivotWeekly
SplitDailyFromWeekly@Daily pivot(groupBy(country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		population,
		reported_date,
		source),
	pivotBy(indicator, ['Daily hospital occupancy', 'Daily ICU occupancy']),
	count = sum(value),
	columnNaming: '$V_$N',
	lateral: true) ~> PivotDaily
PivotWeekly sort(desc(reported_year_week, true),
	asc(country, true),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SortWeekly
PivotDaily sort(desc(reported_date, true),
	asc(country, true),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SortDaily
SortWeekly select(mapColumn(
		country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		population,
		reported_year_week,
		week_start_date,
		week_end_date,
		source,
		new_hospital_admission = {Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k_count},
		new_icu_admissions = {Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k_count}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectWeekly
SortDaily select(mapColumn(
		country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		population,
		reported_date,
		hospital_occupancy_count = {Daily hospital occupancy_count},
		icu_occupancy_count = {Daily ICU occupancy_count},
		source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDaily
SelectWeekly sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> WeeklySink
SelectDaily sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DailySink

properties.description: Transform the population data by age

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{indic_de,geo\time} as string,
		{2008 } as double,
		{2009 } as double,
		{2010 } as double,
		{2011 } as double,
		{2012 } as double,
		{2013 } as double,
		{2014 } as double,
		{2015 } as double,
		{2016 } as double,
		{2017 } as double,
		{2018 } as double,
		{2019 } as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> PopulationByAge
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code_2_digit as string,
		country_code_3_digit as string,
		continent as string,
		population as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CountrySource
PopulationByAge derive(Age_By_Group = substring(split({indic_de,geo\time},',')[1],4),
		Country_Code = split({indic_de,geo\time},',')[2],
		{2019_Mod} = coalesce({2019 },0)) ~> DerivedColumn
DerivedColumn select(mapColumn(
		Age_By_Group,
		Country_Code,
		{2019} = {2019_Mod}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectReqFields
SelectReqFields filter(length(Country_Code) == 2) ~> FilterCountryCode
FilterCountryCode pivot(groupBy(Country_Code),
	pivotBy(Age_By_Group, ['Y0_14', 'Y15_24', 'Y25_49', 'Y50_64', 'Y65_79', 'Y80_MAX']),
	{} = sum({2019}),
	columnNaming: '$V$N',
	lateral: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> PivotAgeGroup
PivotAgeGroup, CountrySource lookup(Country_Code == country_code_2_digit,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupForCountryCode
LookupForCountryCode select(mapColumn(
		country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		population,
		Age_Group_0_14 = Y0_14,
		Age_Group_15_24 = Y15_24,
		Age_Group_25_49 = Y25_49,
		Age_Group_50_64 = Y50_64,
		Age_Group_65_79 = Y65_79,
		Age_Group_80_MAZ = Y80_MAX
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectReqFieldForCountryCode
SelectReqFieldForCountryCode sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['processed_population_by_age.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> PopByAgeSink

source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code as string,
		year_week as string,
		new_cases as integer,
		tests_done as integer,
		population as integer,
		testing_rate as double,
		positivity_rate as double,
		testing_data_source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> TestingSource
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code_2_digit as string,
		country_code_3_digit as string,
		continent as string,
		population as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CountrySource
source(output(
		date_key as string,
		date as date,
		year as string,
		month as short,
		day as short,
		day_name as string,
		day_of_year as short,
		week_of_month as short,
		week_of_year as string,
		month_name as string,
		year_month as integer,
		year_week as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DimDateSource
TestingSource select(mapColumn(
		country,
		country_code,
		year_week,
		new_cases,
		tests_done,
		population,
		testing_rate,
		positivity_rate,
		testing_data_source
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectReqFields
DimDateSource aggregate(groupBy(ecdc_year_week = year+'-W'+lpad(week_of_year,2,'0')),
	week_start_date = min(date),
		week_end_date = max(date)) ~> AggregateDimDate
SelectReqFields, CountrySource lookup(country_code == country_code_2_digit,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCountry
LookupCountry select(mapColumn(
		country = SelectReqFields@country,
		cc_2_digit = country_code_2_digit,
		cc_3_digit = country_code_3_digit,
		year_week,
		new_cases,
		tests_done,
		population = SelectReqFields@population,
		testing_rate,
		positivity_rate,
		testing_data_source
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectReqFieldsFrmLookUp
SelectReqFieldsFrmLookUp, AggregateDimDate join(year_week == ecdc_year_week,
	joinType:'inner',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinWithDate
JoinWithDate select(mapColumn(
		country,
		cc_2_digit,
		cc_3_digit,
		year_week,
		week_start_date,
		week_end_date,
		new_cases,
		tests_done,
		population,
		testing_rate,
		positivity_rate,
		testing_data_source
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectReqFieldsFromJoin
SelectReqFieldsFromJoin sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		country as string,
		country_code_2_digit as string,
		country_code_3_digit as string,
		population as string,
		{confirmed cases_count} as string,
		deaths_count as string,
		reported_date as string,
		source as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['testing.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> TestingSink
